typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> src01customer
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		PersonType as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		EmailPromotion as integer,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		Z_PID_ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> src02person
src01customer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		PersonID,
		StoreID,
		TerritoryID,
		AccountNumber,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> slc01customer
src02person select(mapColumn(
		BusinessEntityID,
		PersonType,
		NameStyle,
		Title,
		FirstName,
		MiddleName,
		LastName,
		Suffix,
		EmailPromotion,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> slc02person
slc01customer sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		PersonID,
		StoreID,
		TerritoryID,
		AccountNumber,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		TerritoryID
	)) ~> sk01customer
slc02person sink(input(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		PersonType as string,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		EmailPromotion as integer,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		BusinessEntityID,
		PersonType,
		NameStyle,
		Title,
		FirstName,
		MiddleName,
		LastName,
		Suffix,
		EmailPromotion,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sk02person
